mapper.insert: insert into label(user_id, content, add_time) values (#{userId}, #{content}, #{addTime})
mapper.select: select * from label where user_id = #{userId} and content = #{content}
select l.* from label AS l INNER JOIN article AS a ON l.id = #{id} AND l.id = a.label_id AND a.delete_flag = 0

SELECT a.*, u.username AS author, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as add_time_show, l.content AS label_content FROM article AS a INNER JOIN user AS u INNER JOIN label AS l ON a.delete_flag = 0 AND a.user_id = u.id AND a.label_id = l.id AND l.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.add_time DESC
